comments.body:
```suggestion
            root_packages.append(tag[len("javadoc_root_packages="):])
```
Did you mean to append to this list?
I've now changed this to split on the tag element to generate the list.

@@ -29,10 +30,35 @@ java_home_runtime = repository_rule(

comments.body:
```suggestion
        **kwargs
    )
```
`java_library` supports [additional attributes](https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/be/java.html#java_library). Currently, users of `da_java_library` are prevented from using them.
